product.description: Football is back with EA SPORTSâ„¢ FIFA 21, featuring more ways to team up on the street or in the stadium to enjoy even bigger victories with friends. Play The World's Game with 17,000+ players, over 700 teams in 90+ stadiums, and more than 30 leagues from all over the globe.
